metadata.title: CVE-2022-45420 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Use tables inside of an iframe, an attacker could have caused iframecontents to be rendered outside the boundaries of the iframe, resulting inpotential user confusion or spoofing attacks. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 102.5, Thunderbird < 102.5, and Firefox < 107.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45420` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu1').
